Its function will be appreciated especially by parents of children born prematurely or with chronic respiratory or heart problems. However, it can also be used to monitor the condition of sick children with a fever or children traveling in a seat, to which the parent does not have access and the possibility of control during the ride. The smart bracelet monitors the basic life functions of its wearer in real time, namely the heart rate and the amount of oxygen in the blood. The third monitored value is the temperature.
